Package uk.ac.rdg.resc.edal.ncwms

Classes here implement the ncWMS-specific parts of the WMS servlet

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NcwmsAdminServlet
    An HttpServlet which deals with the admin pages of ncWMS - adding/removing datasets, updating contact info, configuring cache etc.
    NcwmsApiServlet  
    NcwmsApplicationServlet
    The main entry point of ncWMS.
    NcwmsCatalogue
    An extension of DataCatalogue to add WMS-specific capabilities for ncWMS.
    NcwmsEhcacheStatsServlet
    An HttpServlet that returns caching statistics in JSON format.
    NcwmsRefreshServlet
    An HttpServlet which requests a dataset to be refreshed via an HTTP endpoint.
    NcwmsServlet
    Servlet implementation class NcWmsServlet
    StandaloneAuthentication
    A class providing authentication for the ncWMS-admin role, needed to perform admin in ncWMS.

Package uk.ac.rdg.resc.edal.ncwms Description

Classes here implement the ncWMS-specific parts of the WMS servlet
Author:
Guy
